meanings.definition: A tool used for drawing circles or arcs.
meanings.sent1: I used compasses to draw a perfect circle in art class.
meanings.sent2: The student carefully used compasses to create a precise design.
meanings.sent3: The compasses decided to draw a square instead of a circle for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds as she wielded the compasses like a magic wand.
meanings.sent5: The sharp points of the compasses pierced the paper effortlessly, leaving a clean circle behind.

meanings.definition: Navigational instruments used to determine direction.
meanings.sent1: The sailors relied on compasses to guide them through the vast ocean.
meanings.sent2: Explorers in ancient times used compasses to find their way to new lands.
meanings.sent3: The compasses on the ship started giving wrong directions as a prank.
meanings.sent4: His moral compasses always pointed him towards the right path in life.
meanings.sent5: The compasses faithfully pointed north, never leading the travelers astray.
